reviews.review: I enjoy this game a lot, and will continue to play. It can be a lot of fun, and It's great with a group or just by yourself. That being said, I can't really recommend it to new players with the current killer system. It would just be cruel. Killers now typically camp, aka, won't allow other survivors to help, and just stand in front of the hook until time runs out. Another favourite is guard basement entrance, dooming all who attempt to play the game normally. Unfortunately with the way the game is now, that kind of behaviour to encouraged, as killers get the most bloodpoints from sacrifices. It's a real poo poo unsportsmanlike way to play the game. And no, i'm not a whiny survivor, I also play as a killer as well, in fact more often than survivor. It is more than possible to still win without being playing this way.  Games are made to be fun, and I think everyone "aside from the poopy killer" can agree that this sort of behaviour "is not fun" I would like to see more creative ways to give the killers points instead of just handing them free points for playing like a trash player.
I will recommend this game to my worst ennemi, and kill him with Scratch Mirror Myers.

想要生活美丽，就不要玩屠夫，记住！不要玩屠夫，不要玩屠夫，不要玩屠夫！
制作组明显偏向人类，尤其照顾4人开黑的车队。
这个游戏的规则就是人类嗨皮，屠夫陪玩。
不要以为自己玩屠夫练好技术就熬出头了，人类技术好外加车队配合，能秀到你头皮发麻！
练到最后你会发现自己不过是个高级陪玩罢了。纯纯的浪费时间
屠夫？治疗低血压的特效药，人类的玩具罢了！

没玩过的兄弟我先给你推荐一波！

比较喜欢这类不均衡对抗，无论结果都觉得开心哈哈。要不速修背锅，要么人类道具背锅，要么屠夫配件背锅，要么地图背锅，要么版本背锅。。。总之自己没有锅 :)
然后玩了快1000小时了， 有点想弃坑。原因很简单，觉得太耗时了。我是一个玩游戏希望把每一种方式，每一种组合，每一条路径，每一种道具都体验过的玩法，因此玩起来虽然快乐，但是还是太耗时了。 所以有了弃坑的想法，但还是推荐给时间充裕的你。

最后说一下，杀机直播封了，视频前阵子也封了，这种打打杀杀暴力血腥的游戏确实不适合社会主义精神文明建设。身为一个党员，我必须弃坑。23333

但他有时候确实很快乐。人无完人，游无完游。希望没玩过的你也能体会到其中乐趣~

I have a love hate relationship with this stupid fucking game. Lol.
The idea for the game is great, the game can very fun with friends, the licensed chapters are always a hit. Cosmetic drops are often, reward system doesn't feel bad. Good synergy with so many different perks. Thats honestly all I can really say. The issues I have involve game health for the most part, which I think almost everyone in the DBD community can agree on. If you're a solo player and you want to play survivor, I honestly would suggest you don't with the state the game is currently in. Constant bugs, camping, tunneling, toxcity. The matchmaking system is ridiculous. I've fallen out of it for the most part in recent months because of these issues and I really hope it eventually gets a big game health update, hopefully sooner rather than later.

I gave this game several chances, because there's honestly a lot about it that I really like, but I can't recommend this game with the direction the developers have been taking it. It has consistently become more and more buggy and unbalanced with every update, and players' requests to fix bugs are constantly ignored. Hacking has become increasingly common, and some bugs have been bad enough to crash matches. While the most recent update addressed some of the bugs, everything has been thrown even further out of balance. It's a fun concept, but it's so terribly broken and unbalanced that I can't say it's worth playing anymore. The most recent update/anniversary event completely ruined the game. I can go 20 matches in a row as a survivor and escape every time without even getting hit once, but as a killer, regardless of what perk stack I use, there is no longer a way to counter the many, many exploits that survivors take advantage of. The most used survivor meta was recently nerfed, but that's only caused everyone to drastically ramp up how much they overuse other meta strategies. This game is no longer scary or fun. I'll be surprised if anyone is still playing it a year from now.
Como survivor te campean y tunelean, como killer te loopean y tienen perks rotos como el boon de curación, aún así buen juego 10/10
Amei demais, dá pra zuar muito com os amigos.
Bad game. Highly recommend it.

I used to really like DBD, but now it has just become an awful mess to play. Many perks in the game have been unbalanced for a long time, and they need to be changed. Stuff like unbreakable, boon: circle of healing, dead hard, and ds. There are also perks that crash the game as well such as Object of Obsession. The maps in this game are truly abysmal. It does not matter if you play as the survivor, or the killer, you are going to see how awful and lazy they are at making maps. It really goes to show how little care the devs have for this game. I also will go on to say that since skill-based matchmaking has been introduced, it has felt like most killers are unplayable. If you do not play any killers that are at least decent, and that are combined with overpowered perks, you will be crushed by sweat lords. These sweat lords will use nothing but the best perks in the game, and will hold w to the other side of the map if you chase them. These people did exist before skill-based matchmaking, but they were not in every game. The survivor side is also terrible with how many killers have started to use sweat perk because of skill-based matchmaking. If you can't beat em, join em. The state the game is disgusting, please for everything holy, don't but this game.

While my PC hours aren't as much as my console hours. this game hasn't changed at all in the past few years. all that has happened is new characters that don't work properly being added instead of fixing bugs that have been around since the stranger things license was added to the game and even ones prior. i look at the patch notes for this game to see if they actually somewhat decided to fix this shit busted game after a long ass time and it's just stupid cosmetic glitches they fix. not the fact that survs can bully someone till they dc then dunk on them for being bad or going out of their way to harass their steam/xbox/PS profile because they DC'd. the community need to get a hold on their fatherless behaviour for the shit they pull too. you're still protecting this game despite it only seeing you as a wallet with legs. feeding you these poorly designed cosmetics and badly functioning killers that are just copy and pastes of other killers. they make more bugs and instead of fixing them they just remove playable characters. I just simply can't recommend a game where the devs will ban you from the forums when you bring up the issues in the game. the fact they keep putting this game on sale continuously when opposing games like Evil Dead has just dropped and soon VHS just because they know the majority of the play base will leave because even though VHS isn't released yet, the beta is more balanced and clean than DBD has been in the last 3 years. This game is absolute aids and i would rather have that than play this P2P shit again :))

This has to be the most toxic game I have ever played it's like a never ending war on who can be the most toxic if you play killer be prepared to be t-bagged and harrased by the play with friends team if you play solo survivors your team mates leave you to die (I know it's part of the game but when they surround your hook with no killer in sight and t-bag it's really annoying) and if you play with friends the killer is toxic by slugging with no reason and then the chat box. I love this game it's such a fun and interesting game but the community is enough to drive any new player and veteran away and I don't blame them. PS fuck cross play whoever came up with that idea needs beat the fuck up

Innovative game. Certainly worth the asking price considering how much playtime you get out of it. Fun game play loop for the most part. Only set back by hyper-competitive people who always find something to complain about, douchy attitudes and some slight optimization issues at times. It can be stressful if you make it stressful, but otherwise play it indifferently and it's actually not a bad game. 

Purchased for 20 dollars in 2016 - 505 hours of gameplay on and off over 6 years.  Met a lot of cool friends in this game.
Yeah I'd say it's worth it.

does the game have a toxic community. Yes
do the devs make the best choices for the game. No
does it cost a ton of money and time to actually access the bulk of the fun of the game. Yes
does the game make me angry at times due to everything. Yes

But is it fun, and do i enjoy it. YES. after playing it for a couple weeks worth of time on mobile, and it getting too big for the phone to handle. I still wanted more. if you want the best out of this game, get the stuff on sale and do some basic maths to get the best deal on the dlc and such. also as a tip, dont expect to win. play simply to have fun, you might still get mad at specific things, but play smart, learn, and don't expect it to go right, and you will find yourself enjoying yourself more and able to laugh at the people angry at you in post-game chats.
